purpose: The email is a call for papers for a special issue on Responsible Artificial Intelligence in the journal Information Processing & Management. It invites original, high-quality submissions that address various topics related to the ethical, legal, technical, and societal dimensions of AI systems. The submission deadline is October 30, 2025, and the email provides details on possible topics, submission guidelines, and important dates.
evidence_sentences: Call for Papers: Responsible Artificial Intelligence: Methodologies, Implications, and Practices
This special issue seeks to bring together cutting-edge research, methodologies, and critical reflections on Responsible Artificial Intelligence (RAI).
We invite original, high-quality submissions that contribute substantively to the field of Responsible AI.
